user.title: Add LSC Tuya Doorbell
user.description: Enter your Tuya doorbell information. For the IP Address, you can enter a specific IP or a subnet (e.g. 192.168.1.0/24) to automatically scan for devices.

discover.title: Select Device
discover.description: Found {device_count} Tuya devices in subnet {subnet}. Select a device to add or choose an action below.
